title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids      As more of America's population moves away from its agricultural roots, Oxon Hill Farm is a fun and educational way to introduce kids to a the natural and cultural implications of agriculture.  Whether you visit on a warm day or cool,  there is something for kids to experience.  Check out our Schedule of Events for information about our weekly programs and special events.  Or just take take a self-guiding tour and have the kids say hello to their favorite farm animal friend.  Â   Print the following activities and bring them along to do with your kids on your trip to the park. Thinking about the exercises will help you to prepare for your trip.Animal Observation SheetThinking About the ResourcesWayside Information Scavenger Hunt      Kids help press apples into cider. No tasting allowed! NPS photo.
